definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: A workbench is set up to assemble analog cameras in the Leica assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 在徠卡的裝配車間裏，安置着組裝類似相機的工作臺。

sentences.english: For generations of photojournalists working in the middle of the action, a Leica camera was that tool.
sentences.chinese: 對於幾代紀實攝影師來說，徠卡正是這樣的利器。

sentences.english: The Leica camera manufacturing facility is located in Solms, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 徠卡相機的製造工廠坐落在德國索姆。

sentences.english: The authors collected 13 speciemens of this species and its tadpoles at Mr.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道採集于山東徂徠山的該類物種。

sentences.english: A custom-made Leica M7 is covered with ostrich leather.
sentences.chinese: 一臺客戶定製的徠卡，外表面覆蓋着鴕鳥皮。

sentences.english: The CCD is made to Leica’s specifications by Kodak.
sentences.chinese: 柯達爲徠卡量身定做了這款CCD。

sentences.english: The analog Leica M7 is such a classic.
sentences.chinese: 徠卡M7的模擬就是這樣一個典型。

sentences.english: It’s something that is kind of in your blood when you work for Leica.
sentences.chinese: 當你爲徠卡工作的時候，這種愛好會融入你的血液。

definition: to admonish/to warn sb of their errors/to criticize frankly/Taiwan pr. [zheng1]
